thread.section_title: Lanzerac Hotel & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful
thread.title_full: Beautiful - Review of Lanzerac Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: PCW131
title: Beautiful
text: Beautiful surroundings, luxurious room and restaurant. The highlight was the wine tasting room, Marlon who served us was wonderful. Amazing views but not from everywhere, so ask for a room with view of the mountain, with patio and refurbished. Buy wine from the wine tasting room and pay corkage at the restaurant as the price of it is doubled at the restaurant and the other bars. Amazing view from the spa. The cellar tour was a disappointment. Completely non-informative. Could have been so much, especially with such rich history of the estate. Lovely picnic area, get basket from the deli. I would definitely stay again.
